snippet: All three of the major indexes ended lower, as the Thursday deadline to raise the nation’s debt ceiling neared.
abstract: Stock market seesaws as deadline to raise nation's debt ceiling nears, closing with first loss in week.
lead_paragraph: All three of the major indexes ended lower, as the Thursday deadline to raise the nation’s debt ceiling neared.

headline.main: Shares Teeter in Tandem With Debt Talks in Washington
headline.print_headline: Shares Teeter in Tandem With Debt Talks in Washington
